events.message: We received the candidate's application today for the software engineering position, showing strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to skills in software development and experience with DevOps practices.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to handle this application and facilitate communication with the candidate.
We conducted the initial screening call, and the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software engineering principles and expressed enthusiasm for the position.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening feedback and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview as discussed.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on April 20th to assess coding skills and problem-solving capabilities in depth.
